sense.def:
Izraz
where
uporabimo, ko postavimo vprašanje o kraju, kjer nekaj je, iz katerega prihaja ali kamor odhaja.

Z izrazom
where
tudi določimo ali govorimo o kraju, v katerem nekaj je ali se tam dogaja.

seg.quote: I think I know where we are.
How did you know where to find me?
She walked over to where Madeleine stood.

sense.def:
Izraz
where
uporabimo tudi tedaj, ko govorimo ali vprašamo po določenih okoliščinah, stopnji ali vidiku nečesa.

seg.quote: Bryan wouldn't know where to start.
...a situation where unemployment is three million and rising fast.
This is where I profoundly disagree with you.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
where
napovemo stavek, ki je v nasprotju s trditvijo iz glavnega stavka.

seg.quote: Sometimes a teacher will be listened to, where a parent might not.
